item.title: How do you make npcs yell?
item.dc:creator: @jrs0804 jrs0804
item.description:
@jrs0804 wrote:

in your npc handler find where and add

if (npcs[i].npcType == npc ID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Your text here!"; } }

you’ll have to find where to add it, if you alredy have npc’s on your server talkign search for what they r saying thatll help you where to add it, hope this helped if not im sorry
